main event: One or possibly two objects resembling clear plastic balloons were sighted in Newark Valley, New York on July 12, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were observed to be stationary and steady in flight at the time of the report., They were identified by military personnel as resembling unusual double balloons., The observation lasted for 8 minutes with the objects in sight., The sighting was reported by a civilian source., Two fighter jets intercepted the objects during the sighting.
sighted object: one or possibly two clear plastic balloons
